author: kai zhu <kaizhu256@gmail.com>
description: this package will run a virtual swagger-ui server with persistent storage in the browser, that your webapp can use (in-place of a real backend)
name: swagger-lite

scripts.build-doc: . node_modules/.bin/utility2 && shReadmeExportScripts && cp $(shFileTrimLeft tmp/README.package.json) package.json && utility2 shRun shDocApiCreate "module.exports={ exampleFileList:['README.md','test.js','index.js'], moduleDict:{ 'swagger-lite':{aliasList:['swgg'],exports:require('./index.js')}, 'swagger-lite.Nedb':{aliasList:['Nedb','collection'],exports:require('./index.js').Nedb}, 'swagger-lite.Nedb.prototype':{aliasList:['collection'], exports:require('./index.js').Nedb.prototype}, 'swagger-lite.Nedb.storage':{aliasList:['storage'], exports:require('./index.js').Nedb.storage} } }"
scripts.start: export PORT=${PORT:-8080} && export npm_config_mode_auto_restart=1 && utility2 shRun shIstanbulCover node test.js
scripts.test: . node_modules/.bin/utility2 && shReadmeExportScripts && cp $(shFileTrimLeft tmp/README.package.json) package.json && export PORT=$(utility2 shServerPortRandom) && utility2 test node test.js
